section.title: Impacting Changes and Release Highlights
section.para: This version of KHR is a minor release consisting new modules, bug fixes, and items needed by Kuali application partners.

listitem.para: New! Position Management Module
Group key added, single and multiple
Converted most of the HR/Payroll maintenance documents to KRAD (KPME-3227)
Created immutable model objects for most of the Business Objects
Derived objects and changres to lookups (refactoring)
Added more options to the dropdown list that takes user back to the Rice portal (KPME-3327)
Restructured the layout of our default portal (KPME-3278)
Renamed KPME to KHR and changed the logo
Add "newer" record validation to all maintenance documents (KPME-2702)
Move userPrincipalId to HrBUsinessObject and persist the value to databas (KPME-2624)
Move Service interfaces to API (KPME-2509)
Changed the top navigation section of approval pages (KPME-3328)
Lookup/view of scheduled batch jobs (KPME-3343)
Added Holiday Premium to system scheduled time off (KPME-3161)
Warning and Rules Recalculation (KPME-3494)
Shif differential rule rewrite (KPME-3158)
Timesheet not ready for approval criteria added (KPME-2997)
Removed system lunch rule (KPME-3532)
Added system configuration option to CLock Location Rule for hard stop for clock-in (KPME-3262)
Changed the default page size for Lookup results for KRAD maintenance documents (KPME-3102)
Time Approval Tab add icon indicating missed punch timeblock in on timesheet (KPME-3085)
Add icon to mark timeblocsk with missed punch associated clocks (KPME-2975)
Missed Punch routing now uses PeopleFlow (KPME-3265)
Added paramater options fo applying Grace Period Rules to time blocks (KPME-3457)
Added configuration option to no display the Leave Summary's FMLA YTD Column (KPME-3263)
Added feature to download approved leave requests (KPME-2996)
Improved Approve Leave Request interface (KPME-2995)

section.title: Download
section.para: KHR ${project.version} can be downloaded from the Kuali website at http://www.kuali.org/download/kpme.
There is a single zip file which contains both the source and binaries. Please read the Installation Guide for more details on setup of these downloads
Applications can also consume KHR from the maven site at http://search.maven.org/#search|ga|1|org.kuali.kpme.

section.title: Documentation
section.para: API Documentation can be found at http://site.kuali.org/kpme/${project.version}/apidocs/index.html

Formal documentation can be found at http://site.kuali.org/kpme/${project.version}/reference/html/index.html. This documentation is still in the process of review and update which will continue through subsequent releases, so please follow the notes in each document to report any outdated information.

section.title: Contact
section.para: If you encounter any difficulty, please don't hesitate to contact the KHR team on our public collaboration mailing list at kpme.tech.collab@kuali.org. Please indicate that you are using the ${project.version} version of KHR.
